docs.title: 🌐 Welcome to NL Network Automation Meetup
docs.text:
Connecting Network Automation Professionals in the Netherlands

The Netherlands Network Automation Meetup (NLNAM) is a vibrant community of network engineers, DevOps practitioners, automation enthusiasts and software developers who are passionate about modernizing network infrastructure through code.

📅 Upcoming Events 🤝 Join Us on LinkedIn

docs.title: 🎯 What We Do
docs.text:
Network Automation Focus

We organize regular meetups featuring interesting talks and networking opportunities for professionals working with, but not limited to:

  • Infrastructure as Code
  • Source of Truth (SoT)
  • Configuration Management
  • Network Programming
  • Monitoring & Observability
  • Cloud Networking
  • Discoverability & Analytics
  • Validation & Testing
  • Workflow Automation
  • And more...

docs.title: 🏢 Locations & Sponsors
docs.text:
🤝 Looking for Hosts & Sponsors

We are actively seeking companies and organizations to host our upcoming meetups. As a host or sponsor, you'll:

  • Connect with 100+ network automation professionals
  • Showcase your company's expertise and culture
  • Contribute to the growing Dutch tech community
  • Network with potential talent and partners

🚀 Partner With Us

docs.title: 🌟 Community Highlights
docs.text:
SpeakersHands-on WorkshopsNetworking

Our meetups bring together network automation enthusiasts of all levels, opening the stage to whoever has something interesting to share

  • Network automation strategies
  • Infrastructure scaling challenges
  • NetDevOps best practices
  • Tool comparisons and recommendations

Interactive sessions where you can:

  • Build automation playbooks
  • Deploy infrastructure with code
  • Practice troubleshooting techniques
  • Collaborate on group projects

Connect with other professionals active in the Dutch network automation scene:

  • Telecom companies
  • Cloud service providers
  • Financial institutions
  • Government agencies
  • Startups and scale-ups

docs.title: 🔗 Stay Connected
docs.text:
Join our community and stay updated on the latest in network automation:

💼 LinkedIn 📅 Events 📡 RSS Feed

🚀 Automating the Future of (Dutch) Networking 🇳🇱

docs.title: 👥  About us
docs.text: The Netherlands Network Automation Meetup (NLNAM) is a volunteer-run meetup hosting periodic meetups in the Netherlands focused around network automation. We aim to bring together network engineers, developers, and IT professionals interested in network automation to share knowledge, experiences and best practices.

docs.title: History
docs.text: The idea to start a network automation meetup in the Netherlands was conceived in Prague between Bart and Dan, while having breakfast. This was during the Autocon 3 event.

docs.title: Organizers
docs.text:
The NL Network Automation Meetup is organized by a group of dedicated volunteers who are passionate about network automation and fostering a collaborative community. The current organizers are:

  • Bart Dorlandt
  • Dan Peachey

docs.title: LinkedIn Group
docs.text: We have a LinkedIn Group where members can connect, share insights, and stay updated on upcoming events and discussions related to network automation.

docs.title: 📅 Upcoming Events
docs.text:
Join us for our upcoming network automation meetups! Each event features interesting talks and networking opportunities.

13 May 2026 NLNAM Meetup @ APNT

docs.title: 🎯 Want to host an event?
docs.text: We are always looking for companies and organizations to host our meetups. If you're interested in hosting or sponsoring, please contact us or via LinkedIn Bart Dorlandt or Dan Peachey.

docs.title: What we'll bring
docs.text:
• Speakers with expertise in network automation
  • Marketing and promotion
  • A passionate community of network automation professionals

docs.title: What You Get
docs.text:
• Brand exposure to a community of network automation professionals
  • Opportunity to showcase your company culture
  • Direct networking with potential talent and partners
  • Community goodwill and industry recognition

Here you can find all our past meetups. Each event brought together network automation enthusiasts to share knowledge and experiences.

February 05, 2026 - NLNAM Meetup @ Adyen with Netpicker

docs.title: 🎤 Want to speak at a future event?
docs.text:
We're always looking for speakers to share their expertise with the community. If you have experience with network automation, infrastructure as code, or related topics, we'd love to hear from you!

Submit a presentation proposal

docs.title: 🏢 Interested in hosting?
docs.text: We are always looking for companies to host our meetups. Contact us or reach out via LinkedIn to Bart Dorlandt or Dan Peachey.

docs.title: NLNAM Meetup with Adyen & Netpicker
docs.text:
The next meetup is hosted by Adyen & Netpicker / Slurpit on 2026-02-05.

Thank you Adyen for providing your office space to host us and Netpicker/Slurpit for sponsoring the pizzas and drinks!

  • Register for the event
    • Registration ends on February 2nd at 23:59.
    • We are only able to support a limited number of people at the venue so if you cannot attend please be sure to unregister to free up the ticket for someone else.
  • Submit a presentation proposal

docs.title: Specifics
docs.text:
• Bring your ID to enter the Adyen building.
  • There is no (guest) parking available
  • We have a hard stop at 21:00. We will need to be outside the building by then.
    • After the event we can meet at: De bekeerde suster.

docs.title: Location
docs.text:
• Rokin 49, Amsterdam, 1012KK, The Netherlands
  • There is no (guest) parking available
  • Ensure you are entering the correct entrance for Adyen at Rokin 49!

docs.title: Agenda
docs.text: Time Activity 17:30 Doors open 18:00 Welcome + Adyen sponsor talk 18:15 Otto Coster - Creating an AI agent for network automation 18:45 Gabriel Lacerda - How to not go insane with Network Automation: strategies for a healthy development 19:15 Break + Pizza 🍕 20:00 David Lunel / Chris Tomkins - Enriched infra changes with unit testing & code quality 20:30 QR feedback moment (5 min) and closing words 21:00 Be outside the building

docs.title: NLNAM Meetup @ APNT
docs.text:
The next meetup is hosted by APNT on 2026-05-13.

Thank you APNT for opening your doors to host us and fill our bellies with pizzas and drinks!

  • Register for the event
    • Registration ends on May 12 at 23:59.
  • Submit a presentation proposal
    • Talks will be selected and communicated around April 13.

docs.title: Specifics
docs.text:
• Parking is available
  • Train station is around the corner

docs.title: Location
docs.text: Laan der Continenten 182, 2404 WE, Alphen aan den Rijn

docs.title: Agenda
docs.text: Time Activity 18:00 Doors open 18:25 Welcome + APNT sponsor talk 19:00 Talk 1 19:30 Break + Pizza 🍕 20:00 Talk 2 20:30 Talk 3 21:00 Closing words 21:30 Venue closing
